abstract_ssm: This collection includes various materials documenting the activities of the Brooklyn Baptist Social Union during the period 1869 to 1898, including proceedings of the Union's Executive Board, correspondence, a minute book and roll of members, loose minutes and reports, a scrapbook of clippings on the 1874 national convention, and various news clippings, programs, and notices.
